# Accessibility Checklist

- Semantics:
  - [ ] Headings form a logical outline
  - [ ] Landmarks used appropriately
  - [ ] Buttons are <button>, links are <a>
- Forms:
  - [ ] Every input has a label
  - [ ] Errors are associated and announced (if applicable)
- Keyboard:
  - [ ] All interactive controls reachable
  - [ ] Focus visible and not lost
  - [ ] No keyboard traps
- ARIA:
  - [ ] Used only where semantics are insufficient
  - [ ] aria-\* reflects actual state
